information.services_description: Quick appointment booking - Online queue number - Remote health consultation
information.medical_description: Provides quick appointment booking services, online queue number retrieval, and remote health consultations at leading facilities in Vietnam such as Ho Chi Minh City University of Medicine and Pharmacy Hospital, Cho Ray Hospital, Children's Hospital...
information.quick_booking_description: Quick booking, payment, and online queue number retrieval save time and effort
information.media_recognition_decrip: The benefits of the Medpro quick appointment booking app have been widely recognized

bookingInfo.title: Quick Booking - Get Online Queue Number
bookingInfo.description: Patients can actively choose quick booking information (date, time, and medical facility). Patients will receive an online queue number directly on the software

items.title: Fast Online Appointment Queue
descriptions: Quick registration for new or follow-up appointments by selected date
Follow-up visits based on scheduled appointments

items.title: Remote Health Consultation
descriptions: Remote health consultation via phone call
Video calls with qualified medical specialists

items.title: Clinical Test Results Lookup
descriptions: Easily access clinical and laboratory test results online

items.title: Home Healthcare Services
descriptions: Professional home healthcare services including nursing care and testing, meeting common home medical needs

items.title: Partner Healthcare Network
descriptions: A nationwide network of partnered hospitals, clinics, and medical offices
